HealthCheck.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1600  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z]|\-)*:route53:::healthcheck/[\-a-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Primary.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Route.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 9  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: ^[\-a-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Secondary.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FailoverConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RoutingConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EventBusArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z-]*:events:[a-z]{2}-[a-z-]+-\d+:\d{12}:event-bus/[\w.-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointEventBus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EventBuses.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ReplicationState.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

ReplicationConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

RoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z-]*:iam::\d{12}:role\/[\w+=,.@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: .*  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1600  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z]|\-)*:events:([a-z]|\d|\-)*:([0-9]{12})?:endpoint\/[/\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9\-]+[\.][A-Za-z0-9\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointUrl.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^(https://)?[\.\-a-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

State.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | CREATING | UPDATING | DELETING | CREATE_FAILED | UPDATE_FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption

StateReason.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^.*$  
Update requires: No interruption
